ðŸ“– Summary: Surprise is a Python scikit designed for building and analyzing recommender systems. It provides users with control over their experiments, simplifies dataset handling, and offers a variety of prediction algorithms. The library also includes tools for evaluating and comparing algorithm performance, making it easy to implement and test new recommendation strategies.
